name: Brutal Mark
description: After being equipped for 60 seconds, increases all damage by 25% to enemies that have less than 50% Health.
location: Can be found at a random location at Rhom.

name: Butcher's Fetish
description: Gain 15% Crit Chance and 25% Crit Damage for 10 seconds after striking and enemy with a Charge Melee Attack.
location: Found at The Fetid Glade.

name: Cleansing Jewel
description: Removes all negative status effects after expending a Dragon Heart and increases status buildup resistance by 50%.
location: Found at The Labyrinth - The Eastern Wind.

name: Galenic Charm
description: Increases Weapon Mod damage by 30%
location: Can be found at a random location at Rhom.

name: Gunslinger's Charm
description: Increases Fire Rate by 15% and Reload Speed by 20%
location: Can be found at a random location at Earth.

name: Leto's Amulet
description: Reduces Armor Encumbrance by 40% and Stamina cost by 10%.
location: Can be found at a random location at Earth.

name: Mender's Charm
description: 50% ally heal on Dragon Hearts use
location: Can be purchased from Wud.

name: Pocket Watch
description: Increases Stamina Regeneration by 20 per second and reduces Stamina Cost by 20%.
location:
Given by Mudtooth in Helicopter on Earth after listening to all his stories

Can be used as exchange for Bandit Set before fight with Brabus.

name: Rock of Anguish
description: Increases movement speed by 15% and Reload Speed by 25% for 10 seconds after taking damage
location: Can be found at a random location at Corsus

name: Storm Amulet
description: Increases SHOCK damage by 20%.
location: Can be found at a random location at Yaesha.

name: Twisted Idol
description: Increases Armor Effectiveness by 30%.
location: Drop by Wailing Tree

name: Soul Anchor
description: Increases duration of summoned creatures by 100% and increases hero damage by 5% per summoned minion.
location: Dropped by Reanimator boss.

name: Scavenger's Bauble
description: Increases the amount of Scrap picked up in the world by 35%
location: Can be obtained by solving the Song of the Doe puzzle at Yaesha.

name: Vengeance Idol
description: All damage dealt is increased by 30% when the wearer's Health is below 50%. Includes Summons.
location: Can be found at Yaesha.

name: Nightmare Spiral
description: Ranged hits steal 2.0% of base damage dealt as health. Consumable health regen effectiveness reduced by 95%
location: Defeat Dreamer / Nightmare Hardcore Mode.

name: Rusted Amulet
description: Reduces Stamina Cost by 80% but increases Armor Encumbrance by 25.
location: Can be found at Corsus.

name: Talisman of Animosity
description: Increase Weakspot damage by 30%
location: Can be found at a random location at Rhom.

name: Heart of Darkness
description: Increases Ranged and Melee damage dealt by 20%. Increases damage received by 50% for 60 seconds after using a Dragon Heart.
location: Can be found in the Fetid Pools on Corsus. Use the Acid Cleaned Key on the second door.

name: Amulet of Epicaricacy
description: Increases Mod Power generation by 10%. When attacking an enemy with an active STATUS EFFECT. Mod power generation is increased by an additional 25%.
location: Dropped by Red Beetle in the Fetid Pools Dungeon on Corsus.

name: Daredevil's Charm
description: Increases Total damage dealt by 25% for each piece of unequipped armor. Damage received is increased by 1%.
location: 75 Total Boss Kills in Survival Mode

name: Black Rose
description: The wearer's chest armor set bonus is increased by 1 piece. It will not exceed the 3 piece armor set bonus.
location: 100 Total Boss Kills in Survival Mode

name: Talisman of Perseverance
description: Increases earned experience by 1% when slaying an enemy and will last until the wearer dies, unequips the amulet, or rests at a checkpoint. stacking up to 50 times.
location: Survival Mode - 50 Boss Kills

name: Radioactive Ember
description: Increases RADIATION damage by 15% and converts basic melee weapons from physical to elemental dealing RADIATION damage.
location: Random drop on Rhom.

name: Stalker's Brand
description: Firearm sound is reduced by 25%. When crouched, increases Movement Speed by 20% and reduces enemy Awareness Range by 15%.
location: Random drop on Yaesha

name: Abrasive Amulet
description: Doubles application of the CORRODED effect. Melee Charge Attacks apply the CORRODED effect.
location: Found at a random location on Corsus.

name: Shattered Vertebrae
description: Increase Ranged dmg by 10%. When dealing non-Critical dmg with a firearm, Crit Chance increased by 2%. When a Critical hit occurs, Crit Chance buff is removed
location: Complete the Reisum campaign.

name: Onyx Pendulum
description: Dealing dmg with a firearm increases dmg dealt by stowed firearm by 2.5% for 15s. Stacks 10 times.
location: Complete both campaigns.

name: Blessed Necklace
description: Complete the Rescue the Krall Baby event.
location: Reward for saving the Krall Mother's baby

name: Hangman's Memento
description: Survive the Barn Siege.
location: Survive the Barn Siege during the Subject 2923 campaign

name: Vulcan's Detonator
description: Destroy all Warning Totems, alerting all of them.
location: Warning Totems event: destroy all totems while alerting all of them

name: Charcoal Necklace
description: Found randomly in Reisum.
location: Reisum random drop

name: Driftstone
description: Found randomly in Reisum.
location: Reisum random drop

name: Razorwire Necklace
description: Found randomly in Reisum.
location: Random drop Reisum

name: Polished Whetstone
description: Found randomly in Reisum.
location: Random drop Reisum

name: Terror Margin
description: Melee hits steal 1.5% base dmg dealt as health. For every 25% missing Health, gain an additional 1.5% lifesteal. When full health, gain 20% melee dmg.
location: Found at a random location on Rural Earth.

name: White Rose
description: Increases all dmg dealt by 25% for each unequipped firearm
location: Survival: Defeat all Bosses ??? times
